text: Gudrun Margarete Elfriede Emma Anna Burwitz (née Himmler, 8 August 1929 – 24 May 2018) was a German Nazi supporter and the daughter of Margarete Himmler and Heinrich Himmler. She was born in Munich. Burwitz was arrested and made to testify at the Nuremberg trials. She fought to defend her father’s reputation and became closely involved in Neo-Nazi groups that give support to ex-members of the SS. Burwitz died on 24 May 2018 at her home near Munich, aged 88. Her death was announced a month later. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Nazis Category:People from Munich Category:Neo- Nazis
title: Gudrun Burwitz
